snippet: More and more groups are emerging to make protecting women — and shaming the do-nothing police — a cause, combating a longstanding problem in Egypt.
abstract: More citizens groups are emerging in Egypt to embrace cause of protecting women from street harassment, combating longstanding problem that is often ignored by police; groups' efforts, which include patrolling streets to shield women and punish their male attackers, appear to have been instrumental in forcing Egypt's government to take reports of these abuses more seriously.
lead_paragraph: More and more groups are emerging to make protecting women — and shaming the do-nothing police — a cause, combating a longstanding problem in Egypt.

headline.seo: Egyptian Vigilantes Crack Down on Abuse of Women
headline.main: Harassers of Women in Cairo Now Face Wrath of Vigilantes
headline.print_headline: Harassers of Women in Cairo Now Face Wrath of Vigilantes
